news

Recent Photos

These are some photos of me playing...

Welcome to my new website!

I’m excited to say that I just tracked 5 songs for my band Silver Needle. The EP will be mixed and mastered in the near future. Check back for more details about that.

I will be be posting some charts here as well of some grooves, fills and ideas of mine. You’ll also find some videos and mp3s of me on the right. If you’re interested in lessons you can send me an email on my contact page.

I’m always looking for new opportunities, if you are in need of a drummer either for a full-time gig or single shows, please feel free to contact me

Recent Photos

These are some photos of me playing...

Welcome to my new website!

I’m excited to say that I just tracked 5 songs for my band Silver Needle. The EP will be mixed and mastered in the near future. Check back for more details about that.

I will be be posting some charts here as well of some grooves, fills and ideas of mine. You’ll also find some videos and mp3s of me on the right. If you’re interested in lessons you can send me an email on my contact page.

I’m always looking for new opportunities, if you are in need of a drummer either for a full-time gig or single shows, please feel free to contact me
